sense.gloss: to warp, to bend, to contort
to be perverted, to be warped (of a view, mind, etc.), to be distorted, to be cross-grained

sdata.j: ↑色覚↑↓しきかく↓↑障害↑↓しょうがい↓は↑眼球↑↓がんきゅう↓の↑中↑↓なか↓が|↑歪↑↓いが↓む|ことだから、↑治↑↓なお↓せないと↑思↑↓おも↓います。
sdata.e: I don't think color blindness can be cured since it's a distortion in the eye.
